UPLOAD_INSTRUCTIONS_1: Include all registered electors as of 1 December. Ensure all required fields are present and correctly formatted. File size must not exceed 100MB. Ensure character encoding is UTF-8 where applicable.
UPLOAD_INSTRUCTIONS_2: Do not password protect the file.
FORMAT_HINT: Select which electoral register system generated the data.
AGE_SECTION_HEADING: Does the data set include citizens over 76 years old?
ELECTOR_TYPES_SECTION_HEADING: Are any of these elector types present in the data?
ELECTOR_TYPES_HINT: Select all that apply. If none of these prefixes are present in the data then leave all boxes unchecked.
ELECTOR_TYPE_1_DESC: Elector who is either a qualifying EU citizen, an EU citizen with retained rights who is only entitled to vote at Senedd, local government and Police and Crime Commissioner elections
ELECTOR_TYPE_2_DESC: Overseas elector who is only entitled to vote at UK Parliamentary elections
ELECTOR_TYPE_3_DESC: Citizen of a member state of the European Union (except a Commonwealth country or the Republic of Ireland) who is only entitled to vote at Senedd and local government elections
ELECTOR_TYPE_4_DESC: Elector registered as a result of the Automatic Voter Registration pilots, who is only entitled to vote at Senedd and local government elections
ELECTOR_TYPE_5_DESC: Peer eligible to vote in the House of Lords who is entitled to vote at local government elections
ELECTOR_TYPE_6_DESC: Qualifying foreign citizen (except a Commonwealth, Republic of Ireland or European Union citizen) who is entitled to vote at Senedd and local government elections
UPLOAD_WINDOW_CLOSED_DETAIL_1: The annual upload window for electoral register data has now closed. You are not able to upload files at this time.
UPLOAD_WINDOW_CLOSED_DETAIL_2: The Jury Central Summoning Bureau will contact you when the next upload window opens. You will receive an email notification with details of the new deadline and upload period.
